story: As a User, I want to manage content, so that I can keep the platform up to date
As an Analyst, I want to work with data, so that I can generate insights
As a Student, I want to save my files, so that itâ€™s easier
As a Researcher, I want to access external sources, so that I can broaden my analysis
As a Nurse, I want to check records, so that I can provide better care
As a Customer, I want to download my purchase history for 2024, so that I can review my expenses
As a Librarian, I want to search for books by title or author, so that I can provide search results to patrons quickly at the desk
As a Driver, I want to receive alerts about low fuel, so that I can refill before running out
